tool_description: Performs comprehensive quality check on completed resume and cover letter, identifying errors, inconsistencies, and final optimization opportunities.

cover_letter_content.description: Final cover letter content to validate

job_title.description: Target job title for validation context

check_consistency.description: Whether to check consistency between resume and cover letter

error_messages: Empty resume content: Provide resume content for validation.
Invalid document format: Ensure documents contain readable text content.
Missing critical information: Documents lack essential elements for job applications.
usage: Submit finalized resume and optionally cover letter for comprehensive quality validation including grammar, consistency, and completeness checks.

grammar_errors.description: Identified grammar, spelling, and punctuation errors

consistency_issues.description: Inconsistencies between resume and cover letter or within documents

application_readiness.description: Whether the documents are ready for job application submission
